title: Must return an error response if the invoker is a solicitor in a different jurisdiction from that of the case
specs: Becky - with a Solicitor role for a particular jurisdiction under an organisation to create, assign and unassign access to a case for another solicitor in their organisation
Benjamin - with a solicitor role for a different jurisdiction within the same organisation as Becky
is made by Benjamin and intends to unassign access to C1 for Becky

body.message: The user is neither a case access administrator nor a solicitor with access to the jurisdiction
